title: Chinese Watch Face
summary: Analogue clock dial featuring Chinese numerals.
description: Analogue clock dial watch face for Android Wear featuring Chinese numerals.Features• Accent color selection• Dark and Light color themes• Formal traditional and Regular simplified characters• Calligraphic, Classic and Modern character styles• Date display: 月 (yuè) stands for month, 日 (ri) stands for day• Battery level indicator: 电池 (diànchí) stands for battery• Alternate date and battery level indicators• Configuration options• Help topicsAccessing Watch face settings• Option 1, using the phone: Open the Android Wear app, and then tap the white gear icon in the center of the selected watch face.• Option 2, directly on watch: Tap and hold anywhere on the watch face, and then select the white gear icon.Reading Chinese numbersFor detailed information, select Help from the options menu of the Watch face settings companion app on the phone.Requirements: Android Wear 5.0 or higher. Both square and round screen devices are supported.This app is intended exclusively for use with smartwatches and cannot be started on a smartphone.Disclaimer: The application is provided as is without liabilities or warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
descriptionHTML:
Analogue clock dial watch face for Android Wear featuring Chinese numerals.

Features
• Accent color selection
• Dark and Light color themes
• Formal traditional and Regular simplified characters
• Calligraphic, Classic and Modern character styles
• Date display: 月 (yuè) stands for month, 日 (ri) stands for day
• Battery level indicator: 电池 (diànchí) stands for battery
• Alternate date and battery level indicators
• Configuration options
• Help topics

Accessing Watch face settings
• Option 1, using the phone: Open the Android Wear app, and then tap the white gear icon in the center of the selected watch face.
• Option 2, directly on watch: Tap and hold anywhere on the watch face, and then select the white gear icon.

Reading Chinese numbers
For detailed information, select Help from the options menu of the Watch face settings companion app on the phone.

Requirements: Android Wear 5.0 or higher. Both square and round screen devices are supported.
This app is intended exclusively for use with smartwatches and cannot be started on a smartphone.
Disclaimer: The application is provided as is without liabilities or warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
comments: My default face on my Tag Heuer Connected 45!
This watch face is awesome!! Great job! Classy.

Nice! I've been looking for a Japanese watch face and this works well. Would it be possible to use both 号 and 日 as the counter for days on the calendar? That way it will work in both languages. (Battery would be 電池.) Thanks for the update!
5 star if it can use transitional Chinese charaters 請用繁體
Looks awesome and works as advertised. Been looking for a while for a Kanji watch face that looks good. Thank you.
I like the watch face The watch face should make the Chinese white and the face black when it moves to the dimmed display I have the watch urbane.
